attributes.action: respond with an answer to all accepted petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government set up this forum to allow the electorate to make their feelings known to it about issues that are of concern to them. It should not therefore choose to conveniently ignore the petitions it does not like or disagrees with. It should respond to every accepted petition, either on the day of expiry or during the life-time of the petition.

rejection.details: We do not accept petitions about the e-petitions system.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
